hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that Sheik waits at a #monument to time# to teach #the Serenade of Water#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Crater## has #3# major items.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #the Requiem of Spirit#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Forest Temple#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Maze).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that most of the water in Hyrule flows through King Zora's buttocks.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #the Broken Sword#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals #2 Deku Scrubs#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #King Dodongo#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Hookshot#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: If Gorons eat rocks, does that mean I'm in danger?

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##Lon Lon Ranch## has #0# major items.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #Din's Fire#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that Anju needs to stop losing her chickens.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Hookshot#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Huge Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern End of Bridge Chest

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that ##the Ice Cavern## has #2# major items.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides a #generic grotto#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Arrows (10 pieces)# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Farore's Wind# can be found in #the Market#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Fire Bottle#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #a Small Key# and #a Small Key#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #treasure chest game# grants #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #Epona's Song#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #deep in the wasteland# is #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Fire Bottle#.
